specificLearningOutcomes: Retell the story of Peter’s miraculous rescue from prison
List lessons learnt from the story of Peter’s rescue
Have faith in God as exemplified by Apostle Peter

Read Acts 12:3-17 and retell the story
Watch a video on Peter’s miraculous rescue

Engage in activities that strengthen their faith in Christ

specificLearningOutcomes: Identify five qualities/values to consider in choosing good friends

Choose friends with good moral character

In pairs, brainstorm on how to avoid negative behaviour/ peer influence

Desire to behave responsibly as a young person

specificLearningOutcomes: Discuss Christian teachings on God as the only source of life

Explain how to cope with difficult emotions to avoid violation of right to life
Acknowledge that life is sacred and a gift from God

Share examples of violation of right to life today

specificLearningOutcomes: List drugs abused by young people today
